section.p: Items on this list are planned items that aren't bugs or feature requests. In other words, these are all those things that need to be done but aren't listed in the sourceforge bug tracker. They are in no particular order.

ol.li: Have TopLevelWindow's deregister themselves with WebClient when they are closed
Upgrade HttpClient to the latest gump version
HtmlTextArea.getText() and setText() currently don't modify the dom. This should be fixed
Use HtmlUnit to verify all links in generated documentation
Generate one big pdf from all the smaller documents
